title: The Saturday Evening Post

contents.note: FictionMags Index (might not list all nonfiction content)

renewed-contributions.title: The Belting Bookworm
renewed-contributions.note: Title as given in CCE renewal record.  FictionMags gives title as 'The Betting Bookworm'.  I have not examined the issue in question.

renewed-contributions.title: Miss Simpson Goes Wrong
renewed-contributions.note: Title as given in CCE renewal record. FictionMags gives title as 'Miss Simpson Steps Out'. I have not examined the issue in question.

renewed-contributions.title: Victims of the Plaque
renewed-contributions.note: Title as given in CCE renewal record. FictionMags gives title as 'Victims of the Plague'. I have not examined the issue in question.

renewed-contributions.title: There's a Great Difference in Women
The Private Life of the Dixie Flash
renewed-contributions.note: This story has two renewal records. The record in the 1955 January-June volume gives the title as 'The Private Life of Dixie Flash', but the record in the July-December 1955 volume gives the title as 'The Private Life of the Dixie Flash', as does FictionMags. I have not examined the issue in question.

renewed-contributions.title: How to Instruct the Little Tots in Antiques
The Big Endurance Test
renewed-contributions.note: There is also a renewal record for 'Endurance Test' by the same author in the same issue, but that seems likely to just be a redundant renewal for this story.

renewed-contributions.title: Always Polite
renewed-contributions.note: CCE renewal record puts this story in this issue, but it actually ran in the March 30 issue.

renewed-contributions.title: Always Polite
renewed-contributions.note: CCE renewal record puts this story in the March 2 issue, but it actually ran in this issue.

renewed-contributions.title: Warning Hill
renewed-contributions.note: This issue's installment is not cited in the CCE renewal record for this magazine story, which only cites the four other issue installments. If this installment is not covered by that renewal, it may be covered by the 1957 renewal for the author's 1930 book with this title, or by the general renewal for this issue.

renewed-contributions.title: Warning Hill
renewed-contributions.note: The CCE renewal record for this magazine story cites it as the fourth installment.

renewed-contributions.note: Title as given in issue.  CCE renewal record gives title as 'Captain Whitstone'.

renewed-contributions.title: Thursday, December 24th
renewed-contributions.note: Title as given in issue. CCE renewal record gives title of Banning's story in this issue as 'Saturday, the Twenty-Fourth'.

renewed-contributions.title: Girl in Hiding
renewed-contributions.note: This is misfiled in the 1977 January-June CCE in Periodicals, listed as a renewal for a periodical titled 'Girl in Hiding', instead of as a renewal for an installment of a story by that name that appeared in the Saturday Evening Post issue with the indicated issue date and number.

renewed-contributions.title: Girl in Hiding
